The Biden administration announced that: 86 million to temporarily house migrant families in hotel rooms at the southern border.
Viral posts: including a tweet by Rep. Madison Cawthorn, falsely claimed that the White House has directed "zero dollars" to homeless veterans.
The American Rescue Plan: signed into law by President Biden, includes $750 million to provide housing for veterans.
The Department of Veterans Affairs outli: including funding for COVID-19 related health care, housing support, and improvements to State Veterans Homes.
